value.0:
Four There Were
Origins Unknown
Soul Bonded With Dragons
Their Alliance Had Grown

Terror They Rought
Ye Best Learn Their Names
The Dragon Riders Will Return
They Are The Sacred Flames

Kin To Each Other
And Kin To Their Steeds
With Their Vision And Might
Bringing The World To Its Knees

With Their Unified Power
Their Mounts Not Forsaken
The Mad God's Return
He Will Be Awakened

So Listen To Me
And I'll Tell You Some Thing
Understanding Your Enemies
Could Help You To Win

They Are Axieros the Mother
And Kadmilos her Lover
Kersa and Kersos
Sister and Brother.
